original: @ga   @#/_/'phags pa smon lam gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/🔽@/_smon lam bka' rgya ma bzhugs so//_@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ar+ya pra ni🔽d+ha na ra dza na ma/_bod skad du/_'phags pa smon lam gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/

analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/phyogs
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.🔽By the perfect activity of compassion

translated: of the ocean of victors of the ten directions and three times,🔽may all these aspirations of mine🔽be accomplished just as I have prayed.

original: bzhin du 'grub par shog_/'di nas gzung ste rnam pa thams cad du/_/mos
analyzed: bzhin du 'grub par shog_/'di nas gzung ste rnam pa thams cad du/_/mos
translated: From now on, in all my lives,🔽may I please the guru with boundless devotion,

analyzed: gus tshhad med bla ma mnyes byed cing /_/rnam dag lus dang longs spyod mkha'
translated: make offerings of my pure body,🔽wealth, and merit,

analyzed: snyam mchod/_/skad cig mi 'bral phrin las rgyas byed shog_/skye ba kun tu
translated: and carry out his activity without a moment's separation.🔽In all my lives, may I never be separated from the guru.

original: rigs bzang nad med cing /_/dbyangs snyan gzugs bzang gzi brjid stobs
analyzed: rigs bzang nad med cing /_/dbyangs snyan gzugs bzang gzi brjid stobs
translated: May I be born in a good family, be free from illness, have a melodious voice, a beautiful body, and great splendor and strength.

original: ldan nas/_/tshhe ring 'khor dang longs spyod chos rnams kun/_/lhun gyis grub
analyzed: ldan nas/_/tshhe ring 'khor dang longs spyod chos rnams kun/_/lhun gyis grub
translated: May I have a long life, retinue, and wealth, and may all Dharma🔽be spontaneously accomplished.🔽May I be respected by all.

original: cing kun gyis bkur bar shog_/gang du skyes pa'i tshhe rabs thams cad du/_/
analyzed: cing kun gyis bkur bar shog_/gang du skyes pa'i tshhe rabs thams cad du/_/
translated: In all my lives,

original: sems can rnams kyis mthong thos dran reg tshhe/_/mdzes shing yid 'ong blta
analyzed: sems can rnams kyis mthong thos dran reg tshhe/_/mdzes shing yid 'ong blta
translated: may I be beautiful and attractive, pleasing to behold,

original: bas mi ngoms shing /_/mi mthun phyogs bral kun dang 'thun par shog_/🔽bdag ni mkha' snyams sems can thams cad kyi/_/mgon skyab re gnas
analyzed: bas mi ngoms shing /_/mi mthun phyogs bral kun dang 'thun par shog_/ bdag ni mkha' snyams sems can thams cad kyi/_/mgon skyab re gnas
translated: and agreeable to all, free from any unpleasantness.🔽May I be a protector, a refuge, and a friend🔽to all sentient beings, as limitless as space itself.

original: dpung gnyen gyur nas kyang /_/gang la gang 'dod re ba thams cad kun/🔽tshhul bzhin ma lus bdag gis skongs par shog_/bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i
analyzed: dpung gnyen gyur nas kyang /_/gang la gang 'dod re ba thams cad kun/ tshhul bzhin ma lus bdag gis skongs par shog_/bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i
translated: May I fulfill all their hopes and wishes,🔽just as they are, without exception.🔽May all those who wish to help me🔽and I myself, with our three doors,

analyzed: grogs rnams dang /_/lus ngag yid gsum smon lam cig tu spyad/_/dus 'di
translated: make aspirations together.

analyzed: nas bzung skad cig mi 'bral zhing /_/dag snang bde skyid phun sum tshhogs
translated: And may I have pure perception and perfect happiness.🔽Wherever I am born, may I become a wish-fulfilling jewel,

original: par shog_/gar skyes yid bzhin nor bur bdag gyur te/_/dgos 'dod
analyzed: par shog_/gar skyes yid bzhin nor bur bdag gyur te/_/dgos 'dod
translated: And may a rain of all that is needed and desired fall

original: thams cad yid la bsams ma thag_/phun sum tshhogs pa dpag med char phab
analyzed: thams cad yid la bsams ma thag_/phun sum tshhogs pa dpag med char phab
translated: In an infinite abundance the moment I think of it,

original: nas/_/sems can thams cad bde la 'god par shog_/bdag ni gnas
analyzed: nas/_/sems can thams cad bde la 'god par shog_/bdag ni gnas
translated: And may I establish all sentient beings in happiness.🔽In all the places where I stay, may all beings be free from

analyzed: pa'i sa phyogs thams cad du/_/'gro kun nad gdon 'thab brtshod dbul phongs

analyzed: bral/_/tshhe ring nad med chos dang longs spyod ldan/_/bkra shis bde legs
translated: And may they have long lives, good health, Dharma, and wealth,🔽And may they have perfect auspiciousness and well-being.

original: phun sum tshhogs par shog_/skye ba 'di dang skye ba thams cad du/_/longs spyod
analyzed: phun sum tshhogs par shog_/skye ba 'di dang skye ba thams cad du/_/longs spyod
translated: In this life and all my future lives, may I enjoy🔽The treasure of the sky,

original: nam mkha' mdzod la mnga' mnyes nas/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi phyogs bcur gtong
analyzed: nam mkha' mdzod la mnga' mnyes nas/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi phyogs bcur gtong
translated: And may I give the four gifts in the ten directions,

analyzed: byed cing /_/pha rol phyin bcus 'gro kun smin grol shog_/'khor 'das chos

analyzed: cad mngon 'gyur shog_/bdag ni bslab gsum dri med legs brgyan zhing /_/
translated: Adorned with the three stainless trainings,

analyzed: brtshod bral lha bcas 'jig rten mchod cing bstod/_/tshhul khrims mchog la 'gro

analyzed: ba kun bkod cing /_/legs pa'i yon tan ma lus rab rdzogs shog_/ri khrod
translated: and may I perfect all excellent qualities.🔽May I be content with whatever food and clothing I have in the solitary forest,

analyzed: dgon par chog shes zas gos ldan/_/phyi nang bar chad skad cig mi 'byung bar//

analyzed: 'phags pa smon lam gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ nyams rtogs mthar phyin phrin las tshhad med kyis/_/sems can ma lus smin
translated: The King of Prayers🔽May I bring to maturity and liberation all beings without exception through the boundless activity of perfecting experience and realization.

analyzed: cing grol byed shog_/lha 'dre stobs ldan dregs can ma lus kun/_/bsnyen

analyzed: bsgrub rbad bskul skad cig ma dgos par/_/srog snying 'bul zhing bran bzhin

original: nyan pa dang /_/mthu stobs phun tshhogs bstan pa bsrung bar shog_/bdag
analyzed: nyan pa dang /_/mthu stobs phun tshhogs bstan pa bsrung bar shog_/bdag
translated: May they be endowed with power and strength and protect the teachings.🔽With love and compassion clearly manifest,

analyzed: gis byams dang snying rje mngon gyur te/_/khams gsum sems can ma lus thams cad kun/_/gcig la gcig 'tshhe'i gnod pa rab zhi nas/_/bu gcig

analyzed: ma bzhin brtshe bar gnas par shog_/nam zhig 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa'i tshhe/ gnad gcod mi 'byung chos sku mngon gyur nas/_/gzugs sku rang shar gzhan
translated: When the time comes to die,🔽may the experience of death not be painful, but may the dharmakaya be actualized,🔽and may the rupakaya arise naturally, spontaneously benefiting others,

analyzed: don lhun grub cing /_/sku gdung ring bsrel 'gro ba 'dren par shog_/rgyal
translated: and may the relics guide beings.🔽In all the victorious ones’ pure lands,

analyzed: ba'i zhing khams ma lus thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas skal pa'i rdul snyed rgya mtshho

analyzed: la/_/kun bzang mchod sprin nam mkha' snyam pa yis/_/skal pa rgya mtshhor

analyzed: bdag gis mchod byed shog_/zhing khams rnam dag rgya mtshho mngon gyur te/_/

analyzed: spyod pa rnam dag shes rab tshhad med kyis/_/chos rnams rgya mtshho thams cad rab

analyzed: mthong nas/_/ye shes rgya mtshho ma lus rtogs par shog_/rgyal ba rgya mtshho'i

analyzed: dbyangs sgrog zhing /_/'gro rnams skad du bdag gis chos bstan nas/

analyzed: sems can ma lus sangs rgyas sar 'god shog_/kun bzang sgyu ma'i rnam thar

analyzed: ji bzhin du/_/mtha' bral sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin mngon gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas

analyzed: sku dang ma lus zhing khams kun/_/rdul cig steng du skad cig 'grub par shog_/

analyzed: gting mtha' dpag med tshhad bzung med par shog_/'khor los bsgyur rgyal

analyzed: mkha' mnyam zhing khams kun la dbang bsgyur nas/_/sems can thams cad bde la 'god par shog_/ma 'ongs dus su nad mtshhon skal pa yis/_/sems
translated: Having gained control over all realms of space,🔽may I establish all sentient beings in happiness.🔽In the future, when beings are afflicted by disease, famine, and weapons,

analyzed: skom gyur pa'i tshhe/_/bza' btung dar zab gser dngul longs spyod rnams/_/

analyzed: phun sum tshhogs pa mkha' mnyam sprin bstibs nas/_/phyogs bcur 'dod yon

analyzed: ma lus kun/_/gang la gang 'dul de la der ston shog_/log pa'i lam zhugs

analyzed: shog_/ji srid 'khor bar sems can gnas kyi bar/_/de srid phrin las rtshol med

analyzed: bo byang chub sems dpa'i tshhe/_/bskal pa grangs med sems bskyed smon lam btab/_/

analyzed: tshhogs gnyis mthar phyin mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_/phun sum tshhogs mnga'

analyzed: shog_/gzhan don lhun grub dpag med 'byung gyur pa'i/_/bdag gi smon

analyzed: 'phags pa smon lam gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/
translated: The King of Aspirations🔽All of these paths,

analyzed: 'das thams cad kyi/_/bkra shis bde legs phun sum tshhogs pa kun/_/rgyun

analyzed: rdzogs so//_sna //
